data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 161 believers in the state of Baghlan the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Baghlan, Afghanistan
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Baghlan, Afghanistan not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Baghlan, Afghanistan to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 161 believers in the state of Baghlan to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Turk people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 1,014,507, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Baghlan.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Baghlan, Afghanistan has a population of 1,014,700.

We estimate Baghlan has 161 people who might know Jesus, 32 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,014,507 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6,302 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Baghlan prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
